structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.text: Upon the filing of the complaint the city or other governmental agency created by the city shall give notice thereof by publication pursuant to KRS Chapter 424.
law.history: Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 2. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 2.
